lyrics:
11 contributorsrun on lyricsverse 1 bill landford and the landfordairs
lord god almighty let me tell the news
my head got wet in midnight dew
great god i been down on my bended knees
talking to a man from galilee
michael spoke and he sound so sweet
i thought i heard the shuffle of angels feet
he put one hand upon my head
great god almighty let me tell you what he said

prechorus bill landford and the landfordairs
to go tell that lonesome liar
go tell that midnight rider
tell the gambling rambling backslider
tell them god almighty gonna cut em down

chorus bill landford and the landfordairs
you might run on for a long time
run on ducking and dodging
run on children for a long time
let me tell you god almighty gonna cut you down

verse 2 bill landford and the landfordairs
you might throw your rock hide your hand
work in the dark with your fellow men
sure as god made the rich and poor
youre gonna reap just what you sow
you might also likechorus bill landford and the landfordairs
you might run on for a long time
run on ducking and dodging
run on children for a long time
let me tell you god almighty gonna cut you down
you might run on for a long time
run on ducking and dodging
run on children for a long time
let me tell you god almighty gonna cut you down

instrumental
you might run run run run

verse 3 bill landford and the landfordairs
some people go to church just to signify
trying to make a date with the neighbors wife
brothers let me tell you just as sure as youre born
you better leave that woman alone

prechorus bill landford and the landfordairs
to go tell that lonesome liar
go tell that midnight rider
tell the gambling rambling backslider
tell them god almighty gonna cut em down
